name: Bowtie Glasses and the Case of the Potted Plants
name_original: Bowtie Glasses and the Case of the Potted Plants
description:
A murder (yes! murder!) has taken place in Evergreen Mansion! Help analytical mastermind, Bowtie Glasses, solve the mystery behind all these potted plants!

Controls:

  • WASD: Walk and jump
  • LMB: Investigate
  • SHIFT: Run
